title: Tension Toe Loom with Attached Weaving
description: toe loom with weaving in progress; black and white geometric pattern with a red and a green stripe on either side of center pattern; red wooden sticks at end of work in  progress; wooden dowel and wooden paddle
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
